hero.title: CUIT Blockchain Association
hero.description: We are architects of the new digital economy. Connecting visionaries, developers, and innovators to build the infrastructure of tomorrow.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: CUITBCA is dedicated to promoting the understanding and application of blockchain technology on campus, providing students with a platform for learning, exchange, and practice. We believe blockchain technology will shape the future.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To build an open, inclusive, and innovative learning community that helps students master blockchain technology and cultivate outstanding talent for the industry.

values.title: Our Values
values.openness: Openness - Welcome all students interested in blockchain
values.innovation: Innovation - Continuously explore new learning approaches

stats.activityDesc: Weekly online sharing and practice activities
stats.directionDesc: Promote the application and popularization of blockchain technology on campus

joinUs.title: Join Us
joinUs.description: We welcome all students interested in blockchain technology to join the CUITBCA family! Together, let's explore the decentralized future.

resources.subtitle: Integrating the highest quality learning resources to support your growth journey

reports.description: In-depth analysis reports and industry research to understand the latest technological trends and market dynamics
